snippet.title: Perished World Merchant - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Perished World Merchant is a 2D open world game.
You play as Red "the Merchant" Hunter, who has to explore a desolate world looking for supplies to use and sell to travelers so that they can follow their journeys and complete their quests. If you don't have the item that they need, the traveler may not survive to return...
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CalmedbyTheDark
